alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Buffalo, southwestern Sherman and northeastern Dawson Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1254 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Miller, or 23 miles northwest of Kearney, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pleasanton around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Litchfield and Hazard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central and central Nebraska.
